page.title: 08A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: I wake up at 7.30 a.m., get dressed and go downstairs. I go out into the garden and feed my rabbit with water and rabbit food. Then I go indoors, have a wash and brush my hair. I have my breakfast of cornflakes with cold milk. Michelle and Kelly go with me to school. When the whistle blows at school we line up and go into the classroom and after assembly we do Maths. It is soon playtime with more Maths and English when we come in. At 12.00 a.m. it is dinnertime and sometimes we have chips. Afterwards we do silent reading, Art and have a story before we go home. In the evening I watch television, play games and then go to bed.
